title: Is there anyone who could really give a practical example of the 'law of attraction'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Practical example , okay not a single one I can give you couple of example lets go back to 2013 Jobless , frustrated and Underweight(45 kg approx.)  Somehow I got introduced to Law of Attraction, It took me a little time to grab the concept . So what the first thing I thought Job, Physically strong and Fit. I even attracted the smallest details of my future, believe me I even imagined the working of my company entrance door (I want it automatic) . So what happen next, let's come back to 2017  I have job , Strong Fit physic(65 Kg) and yes My Company door opens automatically . Law of Attraction is nothing but the positive attitude towards life. You don't need any big thing to prove this, you can feel this in small things. Like I use to travel a lot in public bus, usually full of crowd , before boarding in i am always pretty sure, I will get seat to sit and in 10–15 mins , I always get it. Simple and effective. Apply in small things and you can feel the difference. Be specific about what you really want and have positive attitude towards it. All the best -Gopal Gupta
